page.title: 09CHURCH, BURROUGH ON THE HILL
page.content: ST. MARYS CHURCH DATES BACK TO THE 13TH CENTURY. THE RECTORY WAS SOLD IN THE 1950S AND THE INCUNBENT NOW LIVES IN SOM THREE PARISHES ARE UNDER HIS CARE WITH A POSSIBLE INCREASE TO 5 IN THE LATE 1980S. ABOUT 10% OF THE POPULATION OF BURROUGH ATTEND SERVICES. THE FABRIC OF THE CHURCH IS IN A GOOD STATE OF REPAIR. FINANCIALLY THE CHURCH IS SOUND.THE ANNUAL FETE IS HELD TO RAISE MONEY FOR THE QUOTA, WHICH IN 1985 IS L1,306. THIS IS THE PARISHES SHARE TOWARDS THE STIPEND OF THE INCUMBENT. THE LAITY ARE COMING MORE INVOLVED IN THE WORK OF THE CHURH. THERE ARE 3 LAY ELDERS. A JUNIOR CHURCH TAKES PLACE EACH TUESDAY EVENING FOR THE 3 PARISHES OF THE GROUP.
